scripts.dev:both: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND "npm --prefix src/main/frontend run dev" "mvn -q spring-boot:run"
scripts.clean:frontend: rm -rf src/main/frontend/node_modules src/main/frontend/node_modules/.vite src/main/frontend/package-lock.json package-lock.json src/main/frontend/vite-cache src/main/frontend/node_modules src/main/frontend/node src/main/frontend/dist
